com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions
Interface ActionBody

public interface ActionBody

The body of an action.

Method Summary
 ActionBody copy()
          Copies this action body, so that it can be invoked later.
 void invoke(Context context, Writer writer)
          Invokes this body.
 

Method Detail

copy

ActionBody copy()
Copies this action body, so that it can be invoked later.

Returns:
a copy of this action body

invoke

void invoke(Context context,
            Writer writer)
            throws ActionException,
                   ContextException,
                   WriterException
Invokes this body.

Parameters:
context - the context to operate in
writer - the writer to use
Throws:
ActionException - when something goes wrong while invoking this body
ContextException - when something goes wrong while using the context
WriterException - when something goes wrong while using the writer
